colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES LO GLUD DU GRAGS PA'I LO RIM DU DMIGS NAS 'JIG RTEN PA'I SDE BRGYAD CHEN PO SPYI LA DMIGS NAS MCHOD TSUL 'DI NI, GA-YO SA'I SNGAGS 'CHANG TSE DBANG RAB BRTAN SOGS GZHAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BSHAD SGRUB MING CAN GYIS DPE SNGA MA GSUM @010A *, ,TZAM MTHONG YANG MA 'BREL BA DANG MTSANG BA CHE 'DUGS, DPAL MGON 'DI DAG MDO SNGAGS KYI PHYOGS GNYIS KA NAS 'BYUNG ZHING GRAGS CHE BAR MA ZAD, GZHAN BAN BON RNAMS KYIS KYANG BKUR ZHING MCHOD 'DUG PAS KHYAD CHE BAR BSAMS NAS NO NE'I DGON NYID DU BSGYUR TE, YI GE PA NI T'A YI LA LUNG BLO BZANG DON GRUB PA'O, ,)
